description: An HTML file that provides a frontend interface for viewing databases and their tables. It includes a sidebar for database selection, loading indicators, error handling, and responsive design features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays a list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Reloads the list of databases and resets the current selection.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of tables under a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the tables of a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates and renders a data table based on fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Handles the rendering of individual cells in the data table.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands a cell's content or contracts it to show a shortened version.
